results.name: Number A(n,k) of compositions of n where differences between neighboring parts are in {-k,k}; square array A(n,k), n>=0, k>=0, read by antidiagonals.
maple: b:= proc(n, i, k) option remember;
`if`(n<1 or i<1, 0, `if`(n=i, 1, add(b(n-i, i+j, k), j={-k, k})))
mathematica: b[n_, i_, k_] := b[n, i, k] = If[n < 1 || i < 1, 0, If[n == i, 1, Sum[b[n - i, i + j, k], { j, Union[{-k, k}]}]]]; a[n_, k_] := If[n == 0, 1, Sum[b[n, j, k], {j, 1, n}]]; Table[Table[a[n, d - n], {n, 0, d}], {d, 0, 15}] // Flatten (* _Jean-François Alcover_, Dec 13 2013, translated from Maple *)
